metadata.title: CVE-2020-12872 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: yaws_config.erl in Yaws through 2.0.2 and/or 2.0.7 loads obsolete TLS ciphers, as demonstrated by ones that allow Sweet32 attacks, if running on an Erlang/OTP virtual machine with a version less than 21.0.

criterions.comment: yaws package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
